name: Lily's Coin
description: Lily's Coin ($LILY) is a playful memecoin inspired by my dog, Lily, who shares a special bond with the world of crypto—she was born on January 3, 2009, the same day Bitcoin’s blockchain began! Just like Bitcoin, $LILY has a fixed supply of 21 million tokens, but it's all about bringing a fun, community-driven twist to the space. We aim to grow by spreading Lily's story, building a strong community, and securing exchange listings that make $LILY easy for everyone to trade and enjoy.
